creator: sanduatwork@hotmail.com
text:
It seems ant discovers circular references by looking at the location of
build.xml and the target that is being called. What it doesn't take into account
is the basedir.
I have a generic script that invokes a target on dependent projects before
calling it locally and I get the exception:
" ... task calling a target that depends on its parent target ..." thrown from
Ant.execute.
I was actually able to workaround by creating and invoking a bogus script:
<project name="bogus">
<import file="realscrpt.xml"/>
</project>
